function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of international collaboration in health policies and protocols","Impact":"Slower progress towards working for a cure and universally acceptable policy approach","Mitigation":"Implementing global collaborative approaches and data sharing between different cities","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, international health networks","People":"Global population, policymakers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"World Health Organization, policymakers, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Less preparedness of global cities due to lack of information on outbreak issues","Impact":"Challenges in handling outbreak, lack of knowledge about symptoms, protective measures, and treatment procedures","Mitigation":"Sharing comprehensive information on outbreak issues, establishing global health education programs","Technologies":"Online educational platforms, global communication networks","People":"Global population, healthcare professionals","Owner":"World Health Organization, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Historical delays in identifying and addressing previous outbreaks","Impact":"Delays in identification and treatment of outbreaks, leading to prolonged health risks","Mitigation":"Implementing timely response strategies, improving outbreak detection systems","Technologies":"Advanced diagnostic tools, outbreak surveillance systems","People":"Global population, healthcare professionals","Owner":"World Health Organization, healthcare organizations"}]}
